entities.name: MICROSOFT CORPORATION
entities.description: Microsoft Corporation is the registrant of the report signed on July 29, 2021, and has various subsidiaries and executive members.

entities.name: ALICE L. JOLLA
entities.description: Alice L. Jolla is the Corporate Vice President and Chief Accounting Officer (Principal Accounting Officer) of Microsoft Corporation.

entities.name: SATYA NADELLA
entities.description: Satya Nadella is the Chairman and Chief Executive Officer (Principal Executive Officer) of Microsoft Corporation.

entities.name: REID HOFFMAN
entities.description: Reid Hoffman is a Director at Microsoft Corporation.

entities.name: HUGH F. JOHNSTON
entities.description: Hugh F. Johnston is a Director at Microsoft Corporation.

entities.description: Teri L. List is a Director at Microsoft Corporation.

entities.name: CHARLES W. SCHARF

entities.name: JOHN W. STANTON
entities.description: John W. Stanton is a Director at Microsoft Corporation.

entities.name: JOHN W. THOMPSON
entities.description: John W. Thompson is the Lead Independent Director at Microsoft Corporation.

entities.name: EMMA N. WALMSLEY
entities.description: Emma N. Walmsley is a Director at Microsoft Corporation.

entities.name: PADMASREE WARRIOR
entities.description: Padmasree Warrior is a Director at Microsoft Corporation.

entities.name: AMY E. HOOD
entities.description: Amy E. Hood is the Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer (Principal Financial Officer) of Microsoft Corporation.

entities.name: MICROSOFT IRELAND RESEARCH
entities.description: Microsoft Ireland Research is a subsidiary of Microsoft Corporation incorporated in Ireland.

entities.name: MICROSOFT GLOBAL FINANCE
entities.description: Microsoft Global Finance is a subsidiary of Microsoft Corporation incorporated in Ireland.

entities.name: MICROSOFT IRELAND OPERATIONS LIMITED
entities.description: Microsoft Ireland Operations Limited is a subsidiary of Microsoft Corporation incorporated in Ireland.

entities.name: MICROSOFT ONLINE, INC.
entities.description: Microsoft Online, Inc. is a subsidiary of Microsoft Corporation incorporated in the United States.

entities.name: LINKEDIN CORPORATION
entities.description: LinkedIn Corporation is a subsidiary of Microsoft Corporation incorporated in the United States.

entities.name: LINKEDIN IRELAND UNLIMITED COMPANY
entities.description: LinkedIn Ireland Unlimited Company is a subsidiary of Microsoft Corporation incorporated in Ireland.

entities.name: DELOITTE & TOUCHE LLP
entities.description: Deloitte & Touche LLP is the independent registered public accounting firm that provided consent for the incorporation by reference in various registration statements of Microsoft Corporation.
